summary: Two Cuban brothers bring a new music to the 1950s USA. They are as different as the problems that await them.
cast: Pablo Calogero|Scott Cohen|Mario Grillo|Ralph Irizarry|Pete Macnamara|James Medina|Marcos Quintanilla|J.T. Taylor|William Thomas Jr.|Yul Vazquez|Armand Assante|Antonio Banderas|Cathy Moriarty|Maruschka Detmers|Desi Arnaz Jr.|Celia Cruz|Roscoe Lee Browne|Vondie Curtis-Hall|Tito Puente|Talisa Soto|Joe Petruzzi|Anh Duong|Cordelia González|Theodora Castellanos|Lázaro Pérez|Helena Carroll|John Herrera|Vitamin C|Jose Duvall|Joe Conzo|Millie P.|Doug Barron|Jose Alberto|Machito|Ron Townson|June Brown|Valerie McIntosh|Jonathan Del Arco|Salvador Miranda|Carlos Gómez|Adrian Martinez|Rene Monteaqudo|Cecelia Neal Ortiz|Jessica Neal Ortiz|Thomas F. title: Los reyes del mambo tocan canciones de amor
